subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Flyers, who overcame a two-goal deficit to tie the series, 1-1, stopped a nine-game losing streak at the Garden and handed the Rangers their seventh straight loss in Game 2s.
snippet: The Flyers, who overcame a two-goal deficit to tie the series, 1-1, stopped a nine-game losing streak at the Garden and handed the Rangers their seventh straight loss in Game 2s.
